body: what's the 4th one with the healing?

And so the evil stepmother escaped unseen. No culprit was ever found, the case declared as an tragic accident and the murder never punished. But the vengfull spirit of a girl remained. And the gods granted her revenge by getting reincarneted as the newborn of her once evil stepmother. A child born of hatred and unatoned crimes, destined to make the live of her former torturer a living helll. The perfect, celestial reincarnation-revenge-plot.
@Doge007 It is not recommended to be run over by a train as it will bother people. After all hanging is the best. Please die quickly
